donor_name: PROVISIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF SELF GOVERNMENT IN KOSOVO
outputs.output_descr: The project will provide expert and technical support to strengthen the capacity of the Government working group for further implementation of the Law on Use of Languages. Its effective implementation will promote human rights, contribute to minority inclusion and access to qualitative documents, reducing ethnic distance between Albanian and Serbian and other communities.

donor_name: PROVISIONAL INSTITUTIONS OF SELF GOVERNMENT IN KOSOVO
outputs.output_descr: The intervention addresses directly the fragmentation, the sense of inequality and sensitivity to conflict in Kosovo's communities, by extending rapid support to vulnerable individuals and communities that are at risk of social exclusion because of underdeveloped livelihoods, poor living conditions and lack of social protection.

project_title: Support reintegration, self-reliance and language use
